page.title: 05The Kimpton May Festival
page.content: For the last 21 years, during the first weekend in May, Kimpton has held an annual May Festival.The carnival day starts with a procession to The Green of horse and manually drawn carts laden with flowers and prettily painted designs.Here the May Queen is crowned.Crowds of people work and have fun to raise money for the village by running stalls and side_shows and selling food.The school children dance Morris and Maypole dances on The Green.There are various activities throughout the Weekend, including : Exibitions, dances, the finals of the Brains of Kimpton Quiz, a visit by the Offley Morris Men and a play performed by The Kimpton Players.The weekend ends on the Monday with a sponsored Fun-Run in fancy-dress over a distance of about 6 miles.
